column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Meelo says : " While you try to pull yourself together , Poki and I are gon na go into town and find out if anyone has seen Korra . "
#Text=Ikki says : " Sounds like a good plan to me ! "
#Text=Meelo says : " Enough chit - chat , you can hold the picture of Korra I drew . "
#Text=Ikki says : " Wow , I did n't know you could draw ! "
#Text=Meelo says : " You do n't know a lot of things about me , sister .
#Text=" Old lady says : " Well , are n't you an adorable little thing .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I 'm not adorable !
#Text=I 'm dangerous .
#Text=" Old lady says : " Dangerously cute with those cheeks .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Aww .
#Text=" Meelo says : " This .
#Text=Never .
#Text=Happened .
#Text=Let 's split .
#Text=" Man # 1 says : " The Avatar ?
#Text=We still have one of those ?
#Text=Have n't seen her , kid .
#Text=Sorry .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Man ... " Meelo says : " Can I trust you ?
#Text=" Tuyen says : " I guess so .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I 'm on a top secret mission to find the Avatar .
#Text=Have you seen her ?
#Text=" Tuyen says : " I have n't , sorry .
#Text=Top secret mission , huh ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " Yeah , it 's been pretty dangerous .
#Text=I 've seen some things .
#Text=" Tuyen says : " Really ?
#Text=What kind of things ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " Craaazy things .
#Text=" Tuyen says : " Cool .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I 'm Meelo .
#Text=What should I call you , other than " beautiful " ?
#Text=" Tuyen says : " I 'm Tuyen .
#Text=Nice to meet you .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Ooh !
#Text=Meelo 's got a girlfriend !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Go away , Ikki !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Jinora 's been looking for you .
#Text=We 're moving on .
#Text=" Tuyen says : " Looks like you got to get back to your mission .
#Text=Good luck .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Thanks a lot , Ikki .
#Text=You drove away the love of my life .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Jinora !
#Text=Ikki !
#Text=It 's Korra !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Where ?!
#Text=Where ?!
#Text=Where ?!
#Text=" Jinora says : " It 's just a photo of Korra .
#Text=" Meelo says : " At least it 's something .
#Text=" Fishmonger says : " Pretty neat , huh ?
#Text=She came by here , about uh , six months ago .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Looks like someone just strummed up a good - old - fashioned lead .
#Text=Then where did she go ?
#Text=" Fish monger says : " Oh , I do n't know .
#Text=But she was n't looking too good .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Ikki , this is all your fault .
#Text=" Ikki says : " What ?
#Text=I did n't do anything .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Exactly !
#Text=You need to start pulling your weight !
#Text=That goes for you too , so - called leader !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Remember when he used to be so nice and sweet ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " No .
#Text=" Korra says : " So ... what 's the plan for today ?
#Text=" Toph says : " You 're looking at it .
#Text=" Korra says : " We did n't do anything yesterday , or the day before that .
#Text=I know !
#Text=Tell me the story of how you taught Aang how to earthbend .
#Text=" Toph says : " What 's there to tell ?
#Text=I threw some rocks at the Avatar , he got all whiny and Sokka fell in a hole .
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought there 'd be more to it than that .
#Text=What about the time you took down the Fire Lord ?
#Text=That must have been epic !
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh yeah .
#Text=It was hot .
#Text=I was on a blimp .
#Text=And I think a giant turtle showed up .
#Text=Wow .
#Text=What a day .
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay , you 're terrible at telling stories .
#Text=" Toph says : " You 're terrible at listening to them !
#Text=" Toph says : " Quit making all that racket !
#Text=If you 're so anxious to do something , why do n't you collect some mushrooms for dinner ?
#Text=" Korra says : " You got it .
#Text=" Toph says : " Take the path until you see the boulder with the hole in it .
#Text=Then go to your left .
#Text=Oh , and make sure you get the big , slimy ones !
#Text=They 're the tastiest !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Hey , where 's all the food Mom gave us ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " I threw it in the river .
#Text=" Ikki says : " You did what ?!
#Text=That food was supposed to last us two weeks !
#Text=" Jinora says : " Hey , keep it down !
#Text=I 'm trying to meditate .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Yeah , keep it down , Ikki .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Meelo threw away all our food !
#Text=" Meelo says : " From now on , we hunt for our meals .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Meelo , we 're vegetarians .
#Text=We do n't hunt !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Enough whining .
#Text=Poki and I will go find some grub .
#Text=" Ikki says : " My name is Meelo .
#Text=I like to throw away food and fart at inappropriate moments .
#Text=I 'm Jinora .
#Text=I 'm above it all because I 'm meditating all the time .
#Text=Oh , I 'm sorry , I did n't see you there .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Wait !
#Text=You dropped your breakfast !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Hey !
#Text=Does this mean we 're friends ?
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " You 're trespassing !
#Text=Hold it right there .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " All right , little airbender .
#Text=Tell us what you 're doing in the Earth Empire .
#Text=Are you spying ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " No !
#Text=I swear I 'm not a spy .
#Text=I 've been traveling with my brother and sister .
#Text=It 's our first big mission and my dad , Tenzin , is counting on us .
#Text=But if we do n't find the Avatar , he 's gon na be really disappointed .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Can I talk to you for a second ?
#Text=This girl is Tenzin 's kid and she 's looking for the Avatar .
#Text=Do you know what that means ?
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " No , but try this macaroon !
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Get that out of my face !
#Text=Look , if we capture these three airbender kids and bring them to Kuvira , I bet we get a big - time promotion .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " You mean we get out of this dump ?
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Sorry , little lady , it looks like we got off on the wrong foot .
#Text=So , you 're out here with your brother and sister , where 's your campsite ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Why do you want to know ?
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " We just want to get the family back together again .
#Text=Maybe we can sit everybody down and have a nice plate of macaroons .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Where did you get those ?
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " I found a whole sack of food down by the river !
#Text=And with each delicious snack , comes a lovely hand - written note .
#Text=This one says : " You 're my handsome little man . "
#Text=That is so touching !
#Text=" Ikki says : " My mom wrote those notes !
#Text=That 's our sack of food !
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Enough with the cute notes !
#Text=Where are your brother and sister ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Who cares ... I do n't want to see them .
#Text=I 'd rather hang out here with you guys .
#Text=Hit me with one of those macaroons .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Are you okay ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " Yep , totally fine !
#Text=I hope you 're hungry , because we found some ... We found some berries !
#Text="
